${ModID}:BindingChains.NAME: Binding Chains
${ModID}:BindingChains.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Enemy loses !M! Strength this turn. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:FreezingVenom.NAME: Freezing Venom
${ModID}:FreezingVenom.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! ${ModID}:Frostbite and Poison to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:EssenceGrasp.NAME: Essence Grasp
${ModID}:EssenceGrasp.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw 1 card for each of ${ModID}:Ignite, ${ModID}:Frostbite, and Poison the enemy has.

${ModID}:ArmorOfMalice.NAME: Armor of Malice
${ModID}:ArmorOfMalice.DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equal to the number of debuffs on ALL enemies +3.
${ModID}:ArmorOfMalice.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equal to the number of debuffs on ALL enemies +6.
